message.body: ￼Taken by Kim my friend at massart thought of you
Cool! It is twice the size I had in grad school. I did stuff with the ceiling. Plus you have the whole city of Boston as your studio.

Yea I will be there and actually do you mind if we postpone our date for breaking the fast and instead do it all together on the weekend? That would be helpful bc I wll be able to go to my moms Wednesday night instead. Ok with you all??
